document_data.name: Scything Wind
document_data.location: [[Luskan]], [[Sword Coast North]]Since the ship was remembered in Luskan, it can be assumed Luskan was its home port. This is however not explicitly stated in the source material.
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Scything Wind''''' was a ship that was burned at sea in [[1466 DR]]. A monument to the ship, mounted with plaques commemorating the deceased crew members, was erected in [[Luskan]]'s graveyard, and was still standing as of the 1490s DR.
